lejos.nxt.addon
Class LSC

java.lang.Object
  lejos.nxt.I2CSensor
      lejos.nxt.addon.LSC
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorConstants
public class LSC
extends I2CSensor

This class has been defined to manage the device LSC, Lattebox Servo Controller which manage until 10 RC Servos / DC Motors

Author:
Juan Antonio Brenha Moral
